Paragraph: When PQCDTB was used as a donor and PC61BM and PC71BM were used as acceptors , the device had 38% and 41% EQE at 480 nm , respectively.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

The only material property mentioned in the paragraph is EQE (External Quantum Efficiency), which is a measure of the efficiency of a light-emitting diode or solar cell. The wavelength 480 nm is not a material property, but rather a parameter used to measure the EQE.
